name: bionicjs
author: Marco Vanetti

scripts.compile-parser: node node_modules/pegjs/bin/pegjs --allowed-start-rules "CommentText, Tags, BionicTag, DescriptionTag" -o parser/annotation/Parser.js parser/annotation/pegjsSrc/Parser.pegjs

jest-comment: the transform:{} config is to disable transpillation and avoid problems while debugging async code
